line.text: The Raven Software X-Men Legends 2 team would

The brothers Raffel, Stan 'The Man' Lee, The Q4 Veterans, The Unannounced Team, Our Production crew at Activision, Blur Studios, SuperVillain Studios, Vicarious Visions, Barking Lizards, Beenox, The V Drive, Three Point Place, Cub Foods, 5 minutes, another 34%%, FTP space, Westfield Comics, Kraemer Brothers, Mike Holt, Cedars Sinai Hospital
...and a very special thanks to our spouses, family and friends who have given us their love, patience and support along the way, without which this game could not have been made.
Introducing all the new Raven babies
Blaine Christine, Chris Archer, Juan Valdes, Brian Pass, Jeff Poffenbarger, T.Q. Jefferson, Jeff Chen, Nevin Dravinski, Mae Inthavong

Jim Summers, Jason Wong, Tim Vanlaw, Matt McClure, Nadine Theuzillot, Ed Clune, Evan Button, Indra Yee, Joule Middleton, Todd Komesu, Nicholas Westfield, Vyente Ruffin, Chris Keim, Francis Jimenez, Neil Barizo, Chris Neal, Willie Bolton, Chad Siedhoff, Jennifer Vitiello, Jeremy Shortell, Peter McKernan, Nick Favazza, Mike Rixford, Dylan Rixford, Tyler Rivers, Sara Button, Randolph d'Amore, and Alex Coleman.
